name: 陆大迹神Ⅱ
description:
Game features： [/]

Cosplay

Turn combat

Team mix and match

Pet, fashion and equipment collection

Hundreds of special props, equipment and skills

Follow the main plot to explore the world

A variety of mini games, full of fun




Plot line： [/]

Unknown adventurers set foot on the road of the strong in order to put aside the shackles of fate.

Human world, demon world and heaven world;

Down to elves, up to death, whether angels or demons, are obstacles for you to move forward!

Once you step into the field of the strong, there is only blood under your feet!
